person.persName: Lewis C. Pearce (Maysville, Kentucky, merchant and banker)

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, merchant and banker. Fleming County, Kentucky, native. Married to Eliza Ann Stockwell Pearce. Father of Llewellyn T. Pearce, Virginia M. Pearce, William A. Pearce, James L. Pearce, Hiram M. Pearce, Charles B. Pearce, Eliza L. Pearce, and Samuel Pearce. Merchant in Maysville in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1850. Banker in Maysville in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860.
